statements: SELECT * FROM medical_records
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE age > 50
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM medical_records ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM medical_records WHERE gender = 'F'
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE age <= 30
SELECT * FROM medical_records ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM medical_records WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM medical_records WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM medical_records WHERE gender = 'M' AND age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Diagnoses WHERE diagnosis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(diagnosis_id) AS total_diagnoses FROM Diagnoses GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, diagnosis_date, diagnosis_details FROM Patients JOIN Diagnoses ON Patients.patient_id = Diagnoses.patient_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, treatment_plan FROM Patients JOIN Diagnoses ON Patients.patient_id = Diagnoses.patient_id WHERE diagnosis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT gender) AS gender_count, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 60;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, gender FROM patients WHERE weight < 70 ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 30 AND 50;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patients WHERE weight >= 60;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE weight BETWEEN 50 AND 70 ORDER BY patient_id DESC
SELECT name, gender, weight FROM patients WHERE gender='Female' AND age >= 25
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients WHERE gender IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM doctors ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT doctor_id, name, hospital FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT p.name, d.specialization, m.test_type FROM patients p JOIN medical_tests m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN doctors d ON d.doctor_id = m.test_id WHERE d.specialization = 'Cardiologist' ORDER BY p.name ASC;

SELECT p.name AS patient_name, d.name AS doctor_name, pr.medication AS prescribed_medication FROM patients p JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id JOIN doctors d ON d.doctor_id = pr.doctor_id WHERE pr.medication IN ('Aspirin', 'Paracetamol') ORDER BY patient_name ASC, doctor_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(test_id) AS total_tests FROM medical_tests GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(test_id) > 3 ORDER BY total_tests DESC, patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patient_records JOIN appointments ON patient_records.patient_id = appointments.patient_id;
SELECT prescription_text FROM prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 1 AND doctor_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_records WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT * FROM labs WHERE test_result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, COUNT(appointment_id) FROM doctors JOIN appointments ON doctors.doctor_id = appointments.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name, specialization;

SELECT prescriptions.prescription_text, doctors.doctor_name, patients.patient_name FROM prescriptions JOIN doctors ON prescriptions.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id JOIN patients ON prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE prescriptions.prescription_text LIKE '%antibiotics%' ORDER BY prescriptions.prescription_id ASC;
